name: Anchor Panic
storyline:
"Anchor Panic" is a 3D near-future science fiction RPG

In 2085, Taino star was invaded by the alien race "Shogel", and mankind encountered an unprecedented crisis. They wanton destruction, infection, assimilation, parasitism, human civilization is facing unprecedented crisis. The infection of fission bodies, the threat of new humans, the conspiracy of ancient alchemists, a series of problems are intertwined at the same time, where should the fate of mankind go?

As a team chain lieutenant of the United Earth Organization [Lestans Security Bureau], you will work with [AIMBS fighters] to rescue the people who suffered in the disaster, deal with the crisis of various forces, and fight against alien invaders. (The following is the open letter to recruit Lieutenant Lieutenant Lieutenant Lian)

Dear residents:

Hello!

This is a moment of human life and death. This is the first time in our human history that we are facing a war against the universe. In order to protect the future of our families and the planet , we hope that every capable person can join us [Lestans Security Bureau] to fight against the invasion of "Shugel".

In order to win this war, maybe we will sacrifice many, many heroes, but the will of every dead hero is like stars all over the sky, shining on us all the time. The spirit of every lost hero shakes us in our hearts. We remember them and respect them even more. They are the most brilliant heroes in our human history.

Now! The time to fight back has come, let us unite, let go of the needless cannibalism, fight against the enemy, and fight together until the last soldier for our clean blue planet. From now on, the word human will have a new meaning. It is not only a race name, but also a will, a will to resist the invasion resolutely!
